statements: DELETE FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE supplier_name = 'Green Eco Suppliers';
DELETE FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE supplier_name = 'XYZ Corp' AND sustainability_rating > 4.0;
DELETE FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE packaging_recyclable = TRUE AND supplier_name LIKE 'S%';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 500 AND sustainable_packaging = TRUE;
DELETE FROM supplier_products WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND product_id = 100
DELETE FROM supplier_products WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND product_id = 200;
